cause.description:
many people have learning disablities and it makes it hard to focus and learn. Their are many different types, ADD, ADHD, Dislexcia, Austism, Mixed Dominence,
I kno from experience, How hard it is to learn with a learning disablity. I have ADD and was always treated special all the time. It annoyed me sometimes because when I got to a certain age freshmen year of high school I had grown out of it. Make sure that people don't always treat you like you are special. You can learn just the same as any other kid it might just take you longer and you will have to work a lot harder at it.
1. Stop miss dignosising learning disabled people
2. Try to get as much extra help and special needs that people need until they grow out of the learning disability if they ever do.
3. People need to stop treating learning disabled kids like they are retarted because they are not
cause.mission: help as many people as we can
